properties.description: Get IOC description and computer fields for Critical Cloud IOC (optional delay (minutes) or all)

actions.name: Condition Block
actions.title: Condition Block - Start time or delay input

properties.display_name: Condition Block - Start time or delay input

properties.script:
import time
import datetime
s = "$workflow.definition_workflow_01MTBS3PX08T13DnyQkuNld9GvrU538PXoI.input.variable_workflow_01MTBS3PQ9JHH25dD1IayjTLl0yioX86Jyz$"
ts = time.mktime(datetime.datetime.strptime(s, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S").timetuple())
print(ts)

import time
import datetime
s = "$activity.definition_activity_01MU4D2A754841uioDXBxVBGTX4fC0ppp2o.output.result_string$"
time.mktime(datetime.datetime.strptime(s, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S").timetuple())

properties.where_clause: severity LIKE 'Critical' AND event_type LIKE 'Cloud IOC'
severity LIKE 'High' AND event_type LIKE 'Cloud IOC'
severity LIKE 'Critical' AND event_type NOT LIKE 'Cloud IOC'
severity LIKE 'High' AND event_type NOT LIKE 'Cloud IOC'
